p: Thank you for submitting your article "Discrete lysines in the E2 glycoprotein mediate capture of circulating Alphavirus particles via MARCO" for consideration by eLife. Your article has been reviewed by three peer reviewers, one of whom is a member of our Board of Reviewing Editors, and the evaluation has been overseen by Karla Kirkegaard as the Senior Editor. The reviewers have opted to remain anonymous.
